org.datavec.api.split

Class FileSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.split.BaseInputSplit
      • org.datavec.api.split.FileSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, InputSplit, Writable

    public class FileSplit
extends BaseInputSplit
    File input split. Splits up a root directory in to files.
    See Also:
